con:config.con:query: select a.ACCOUNT_OID, a.USER_OID, b.NODE_USER_ID, c.NODE_ACCOUNT_ID from ACCOUNT_USER a, NODE_USER b, NODE_ACCOUNT c where a.USERNAME = :uname AND a.USER_OID = b.USER_OID AND a.ACCOUNT_OID = c.ACCOUNT_OID AND b.NODE_OID = c.NODE_OID AND b.NODE_OID = :nodeid
